title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for an experienced Frontend Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for building the ‘client-side’ of our web applications. You should be able to translate our company and customer needs into functional and appealing interactive applications.
requirements: Proven work experience as a Frontend Developer
Experience with JavaScript, CSS and HTML
Familiarity with browser testing and debugging
In-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design, development and deployment)
Understanding of layout aesthetics
An ability to perform well in a fast-paced environment
Excellent analytical and multitasking skills

title: Backend Developer
description: We are looking for a Backend Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for the server-side of our web applications. You should be able to translate our company and customer needs into functional and appealing interactive applications.
requirements: Proven work experience as a Backend Developer
Experience with Node.js, Python, or Java
Familiarity with databases (e.g. MySQL, MongoDB), web servers (e.g. Apache) and UI/UX design
In-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design, development and deployment)
An ability to perform well in a fast-paced environment
Excellent analytical and multitasking skills

title: Full Stack Developer
description: We are looking for a Full Stack Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for both the server-side and client-side of our web applications. You should be able to translate our company and customer needs into functional and appealing interactive applications.
requirements: Proven work experience as a Full Stack Developer
Experience with JavaScript, CSS and HTML
Experience with Node.js, Python, or Java
Familiarity with databases (e.g. MySQL, MongoDB), web servers (e.g. Apache) and UI/UX design
In-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design, development and deployment)
An ability to perform well in a fast-paced environment
Excellent analytical and multitasking skills

title: DevOps Engineer
description: We are seeking a DevOps Engineer to help automate and streamline our operations and processes. You will be responsible for building and maintaining tools for deployment, monitoring, and operations.
requirements: Proven experience as a DevOps Engineer or similar software engineering role
Proficiency with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitHub Actions)
Experience with cloud services (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Strong scripting skills in Bash, Python, or similar
Experience with container technologies like Docker and Kubernetes
Problem-solving attitude
Strong collaboration and communication skills

title: Mobile App Developer
description: We are looking for a Mobile App Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing high-quality mobile applications for Android and iOS platforms.
requirements: Proven experience as a Mobile Developer
Experience with Flutter, React Native, or native Android/iOS development
Understanding of mobile UI/UX design principles
Familiarity with REST APIs and JSON
Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
Ability to work in an agile development environment
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We are looking for a talented UI/UX Designer to create amazing user experiences. The ideal candidate should have an eye for clean and artful design and be able to translate high-level requirements into interaction flows and artifacts.
requirements: Proven UI/UX design experience
Proficiency in design tools such as Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD
Experience in creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps
Up-to-date with the latest UI trends, techniques, and technologies
Ability to solve problems creatively and effectively
Excellent communication skills
Team spirit and strong collaboration skills
